mean_en: a long structure built in the sea and joined to the land at one end, often with places of entertainment on it; a long low structure built in a lake, river or the sea and joined to the land at one end, used by boats to allow passengers to get on and off
sentence: This beautiful pier is a famous tourist attraction.
sentence_trans: 这个漂亮的码头是个著名的旅游景点。
